articles.content: One weird thing about the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic is that it really makes us all have this collective experience. Its very scary, real, and serious, and at the same time, everyone is urged to… [+4499 chars]

articles.title: BBC Breakfast: Naga Munchetty leaves viewers distracted as she runs onto set ‘late’ - Express
articles.description: BBC BREAKFAST was back this morning with Naga Munchetty and Jon Kay at the helm to give viewers the latest news stories from across the UK and the world. However, Naga nearly suffered a huge on-screen blunder, leaving viewers very distracted.
